SQL_CASE.SQL: create table table_coverage_01(c1 int, c2 varchar(10));
alter table table_coverage_01 add column c3 identity(-100,10);
alter table table_coverage_01 add column c1 identity(-100,10);
alter table table_coverage_01 add column c1 identity(-100,10);
alter table table_coverage_01 add column c2 identity(-100,10);

CREATE TABLE table_coverage_02 ( C1 VARCHAR(100), C2 VARCHAR2(100), C3 BIT, C4 TINYINT, C5 SMALLINT, C6 INT, C7 BIGINT, C8 DEC(13,5), C9 FLOAT, C10 DOUBLE, C11 NUMERIC(13,5), C12 DATE, C13 TIME, C14 DATETIME, C15 BINARY(50), C16 VARBINARY(50), C17 INTERVAL YEAR, C18 INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH, C19 INTERVAL MONTH, C20 INTERVAL DAY, C21 INTERVAL DAY TO HOUR, C22 INTERVAL DAY TO MINUTE, C23 INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND, C24 INTERVAL HOUR, C25 INTERVAL HOUR TO MINUTE, C26 INTERVAL HOUR TO SECOND, C27 INTERVAL MINUTE, C28 INTERVAL MINUTE TO SECOND, C29 INTERVAL SECOND );
alter table table_coverage_02 add column c1 identity(-100,10);
alter table table_coverage_02 add column c2 identity(-100,10);

alter table table_coverage_02 add column c18 identity(-100,10);
alter table table_coverage_02 add column c19 identity(-100,10);
alter table table_coverage_02 add column c20 identity(-100,10);

alter table table_coverage_02 add column c23 identity(-100,10);
alter table table_coverage_02 add column c24 identity(-100,10);
alter table table_coverage_02 add column c25 identity(-100,10);
alter table table_coverage_02 add column c26 identity(-100,10);
alter table table_coverage_02 add column c27 identity(-100,10);
alter table table_coverage_02 add column c28 identity(-100,10);
alter table table_coverage_02 add column c28 identity(-100,10);
drop table table_coverage_01;
